## RouteConfig interface

Route specific configuration.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RouteConfig<P, Q, B, Method extends RouteMethod> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [options?](./opensearch-dashboards.routeconfig.options.md) | [RouteConfigOptions](./opensearch-dashboards.routeconfigoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;Method&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Additional route options [RouteConfigOptions](./opensearch-dashboards.routeconfigoptions.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [path](./opensearch-dashboards.routeconfig.path.md) | string | The endpoint \_within\_ the router path to register the route. |
|  [validate](./opensearch-dashboards.routeconfig.validate.md) | [RouteValidatorFullConfig](./opensearch-dashboards.routevalidatorfullconfig.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, Q, B&gt; \| false | A schema created with <code>@osd/config-schema</code> that every request will be validated against. |
